pkmkdoc.description:
Welcome to the Appcelerator RIA Platform.
This installer will install the necessary components to run the Appcelerator platform on your computer. Once the installation is complete, any remaining files that are required will be automatically downloaded and installed for you.
For more information, please visit http://www.appcelerator.org

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;\f1\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaSans-TypewriterBold;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\b\fs28 \cf0 Appcelerator is a next-generation, open source web platform for developing rich Internet applications (RIA) on a service-oriented architecture (SOA). \b0\fs26 \ \ For more information, please visit the Appcelerator Developer Network at:\ \
\f1\b http://www.appcelerator.org \f0\b0 \ \ After running the installer, you can get more information on all the cool commands available in Appcelerator by typing the following in your console:\ \
\b > app help \b0 \ \ For example, to create a new Appcelerator-based Ruby on Rails project, execute the following in your console:\ \
\f1\b > app create:project ~/myproject foo ruby \f0\b0 \ \ \
\fs20 Appcelerator is Copyright (c) 2008 by Appcelerator, Inc. All Rights Reserved.\ Appcelerator is a trademark of Appcelerator, Inc. \ }
